title: Specifies that where the basis of procurement award is best value, the approach to be used for combining technical and financial evaluation results shall be included
summary: Specifies that where the basis of a procurement award is best value, the approach to be used for combining technical and financial evaluation results shall be included; specifies that information required by competitive procurement process be set forth with particularity except in extraordinary circumstances.

       AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in  relation  to  specifying  the
         approach  to  be used for combining technical and financial evaluation
         results in the  competitive  procurement  process  and  setting  forth
         information with particularity

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraphs a and b of subdivision 9 of section 163  of  the
    2  state  finance  law,  as  added  by  chapter 83 of the laws of 1995, are
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    a. The commissioner or a state agency shall select  a  formal  compet-
    5  itive  procurement  process in accordance with guidelines established by
    6  the state procurement council and  document  its  determination  in  the
    7  procurement  record. The process shall include, but is not limited to, a
    8  clear statement of need; a description of  the  required  specifications
    9  governing  performance  and  related  factors;  a reasonable process for
   10  ensuring a competitive field; a fair and equal opportunity for  offerers
   11  to  submit  responsive  offers; and a balanced and fair method of award.
   12  Where the basis for the  award  is  best  value,  documentation  in  the
   13  procurement record shall, where practicable, include a quantification of
   14  the application of the criteria to the rating of proposals and the eval-
   15  uation  results  AND THE APPROACH TO BE USED FOR COMBINING TECHNICAL AND
   16  FINANCIAL EVALUATION RESULTS, or,  where  not  practicable,  such  other
   17  justification  which  demonstrates  that  best  value  will be achieved.
   18  EXCEPT IN EXTRAORDINARY CIRCUMSTANCES, THE INFORMATION REQUIRED BY  THIS
   19  PARAGRAPH SHALL BE SET FORTH WITH PARTICULARITY.
   20    b.  The  solicitation  shall  prescribe  the minimum specifications or
   21  requirements that must be met in order to be considered  responsive  and
   22  shall  describe  and  disclose  AT LEAST the general manner in which the
